BodyName: Committee on Sanitation and Solid Waste Management

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to removal of abandoned or derelict vehicles
Items.MatterName: Removal of abandoned or derelict vehicles.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to a street cleanliness grading system

A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring that notices of violation issued by the department of sanitation be accompanied by a photograph of the alleged violation
Items.MatterName: Requiring that notices of violation issued by the department of sanitation be accompanied by a photograph of the alleged violation.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of sanitation to install and fill dog waste bag dispensers on public litter baskets
Items.MatterName: Requiring the department of sanitation to install and fill dog waste bag dispensers on public litter baskets.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, S.237-B, legislation to amend the Environmental Conservation Law, in relation to returnable bottles.
Items.MatterName: Amend the Environmental Conservation Law, in relation to returnable bottles (S.237-B)

Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to establishing a rat contraceptive pilot program
Items.MatterName: Establish a rat contraceptive pilot program.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring that all public waste receptacles be emptied by the department of sanitation at least once per day
Items.MatterName: Requiring that all public waste receptacles be emptied by the department of sanitation at least once per day.
